title: Polki Kundan 'Kamal' Earrings - A Touch of Royalty
materials: Faceted Ruby. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: These exquisite earrings showcase a delicate 'Kamal' (Lotus) design. The central ruby is surrounded by Polki diamonds with intricate detailing. The classic design combines traditional and contemporary elements for a unique look.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi or Ugadi
or adding a touch of glamour to a modern cocktail party.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, these Polki Kundan earrings offer a harmonious blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The uncut diamonds exude a timeless charm, while the ruby adds a pop of color and elegance. These earrings are a heirloom piece, meant to be cherished for generations.
